original_text: Your valuable things went to many people in nations across the sea. People were happy with the things that they received from you. Even kings in far places became rich because of you. Your valuable things went to many people in nations across the sea. People were happy with the things that they received from you. Even kings in far places became rich because of you. Your valuable things went to many people
korean_text: 네 물품을 바다로 실어 낼 때에 네가 여러 백성을 풍족하게 하였음이여 네 재물과 무역품이 많으므로 세상 왕들을 풍부하게 하였었도다

sentences.original_text: Your valuable things went to many people
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 귀한 물건들이 많은 사람들에게 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: People were happy with the things
Even kings in far places became rich
Your valuable things went to many people
